column3: All joints & perps are to be filled
column5: All joints & perps are to be filled
Check cavity flashings for correct installation and cleanliness

column3: Check for correct spacing of weep holes
column5: Check for correct spacing of weep holes. Ensure weep holes are installed in first two courses as per the inhabit design

column3: Provide sliding horizontal ties across joints
column5: Provide sliding horizontal ties across joints in unreinforced walls

column3: Check Masonry ties are galvanised steel (Grade Type 316)
column5: Check Masonry ties are galvanised steel (Grade Type 316) must be provided at 600mm maximum centre and at 300mm centres along edges of all openings and vertical joints.

column3: Non-load bearing brick walls finish 10-20mm short of slab soffit
column5: Non-load bearing brick walls shall finish 10-20mm short of slab soffit and shall be fastened to the soffit using the specified ties

column3: Check expansion joint frequency at maximum 6m
column5: Check expansion joint frequency is at maximum 6m and expansion joints over construction joints

column3: Door jambs & openings check for plump/level/position/height
column5: Door jambs and openings check for plump, level, correct position and height

column3: Check all preps & horizontal joints filled
column5: Check all preps & horizontal joints filled

column3: Work area cleaned up & made safe
column5: Work area has been cleaned up and made safe.

column3: ITP completed, all actions signed off, records referenced
column5: ITP has been completed all actions signed off and records referenced have been reviewed and collected and attached.

column3: Characteristic unconfined compressive strength of masonry units >15mpa
column5: The characteristic unconfined compressive strength of the masonry units shall be 15mpa or greater
Hold point for Grout fill to work by site engineer signoff to Proceed
Concrete set at correct MPa as per structural drawing specification.

column3: All cores filled are as per Height specified
column5: All cores filled are as per Height specified

column3: Check type & location of proprietary items
column5: Check type & location of proprietary items specification reference

column5: All joints & perps are to be filled

column3: Check for correct spacing of weep holes
column5: Check for correct spacing of weep holes

column3: Provide sliding horizontal ties across joints
column5: Provide sliding horizontal ties across joints in unreinforced walls

column3: Non-loadbearing hollow block walls finish 20mm short
column5: Non-loadbearing hollow block walls shall finish 20mm short of slab soffit and shall be fastened to the soffit

column3: Check if wall required additional temporary wind bracing
column5: Check if wall required additional temporary wind bracing when construct wall over 3m high
Ensure scaffold are not overload with material for work live load of 675kg per bay refer scaffolding SWMS for details

Correct reinforcement as per structural drawing specification.
Correct installation to Reinforcement as structural drawing specification.
